thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 7 of 1692
thread.title: Timothy

author: Timothy
title: Timothy
text: I found my experience purchasing airline tickets on FlightHub to be simple and well designed. Several options for flights and times were offered at very competitive prices. My only criticism is the lack of a clear explanation on the site or in the confirmation email of how the tickets I purchased are to be obtained. It merely states that you do not need to contact FlightHub again.
